parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the text color of the item with the given position of the 2D listbox. The color is returned in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lnbColor]] [idc, [row, column]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[lnbColor]] [row, column] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbColor]] [0,0];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
